The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... . Sergio Marchionne said both companies would continue to pursue strategic alliances, saying that the market was changing "at the speed of light." He cited Fiat's Chrysler stake as an example.
